action_inputs.description:
Possible PatchModes are:
"AutomaticByPlatform" - Patch installation for the virtual machine will be managed by Azure.
"AutomaticByOS" - Patch installation for the virtual machine will be managed by the OS.
"Manual" - You control the application of patches to a virtual machine.
"ImageDefault" - Patch installation managed by the default settings on the OS image.
action_inputs.label: New Patch Mode
action_inputs.name: new_patch_mode
